  • urbanpiper - Senior Software Engineer-Frontend

    It July 01, 2022

    UrbanPiper is the leading SaaS platform in the restaurant industry. We’re helping the smallest of restaurants to the largest chains across the world to grow their in-store and online commerce. Right from automating all their workflows across online delivery platforms such as Swiggy, Zomato, Deliveroo, UberEats—to building and deploying self-branded websites and apps, right to managing their walk-in customers and dine-in experiences, UrbanPiper is the preferred choice for over 20k+ restaurants.

    We are backed by top VCs — Tiger Global and Sequoia Capital. Recently, we closed our Series B round of funding with Swiggy and Zomato also participating together! That’s a first and only (until now) event for any startup in the food and beverage industry.

    We are looking for senior frontend engineers who have a deep interest in building polished, user friendly products. Having an eye for detail and a desire to improve themselves are key characteristics we are looking for. Being an excellent communicator and a team player will be key advantages.

    Read More →

  • urbanpiper - Lead Software Engineer-Python

    It July 01, 2022

    UrbanPiper offers an integration layer that powers the operational efficiency of 1000’s of restaurants across multiple countries for selling online through their own white-labeled platform or any of the leading food aggregator platforms — Swiggy, Ubereats, Zomato, Deliveroo, JustEat, Talabat, etc. The most defining aspects of our work are related to — consistency, reliability, scalability, and agility. We make use of a wide variety of technologies and process significantly large amounts of data on a daily basis.

    We are looking for server application developers who have an appetite to explore new technologies, while building applications that can scale well both in terms of execution speed and the size of data that is processed.

  • Unbox Robotics -UI / UX Developer

    Design It July 01, 2022

    We at Unbox Robotics are revolutionizing warehouses and distribution centers by building the world's most compact, powerful, and flexible mobile robotics systems for the new age of warehousing. Our product is the World's 1st of its kind AI-powered parcel sorting robotic system that gets installed 10X faster, saves 50+% space and improves productivity by more than 3X with 50% fewer robots than that of the competition. Founded in 2019, we are backed by marquee investors and angels. We are looking to add to our team of thinkers, innovators and doers and would love to have you join us at the Pune, India office and build the future of on-demand robotics logistics solutions

  • miko - Product-Tech Support Liaison

    It Product July 01, 2022

    • Does daily interaction with customer support team, takes in product related complaints, talks to engineering and technology stakeholders to find resolution
    • Builds a pattern driven understanding for most frequently occurring/ large scale issues
    • Escalates it to appropriate huddle to build reports and mitigate the issue
    • Creates response scripts for customer care team to explain known tech issues and their resolution to the end customers
    • Creates FAQ responses for known technological issues and ways to mitigate them through easy to understand steps

  • Zolve - Data Scientist

    It Topit June 01, 2022

    Zolve’s mission is simple: we want to make financial products accessible to everyone. Zolve offers the ambitious a plethora of products to simplify banking in the US, such as:

    • A Bank Account you can create from anywhere in the world in under five minutes
    • A high-limit Credit Card that helps build a healthy credit score
    • Easy, lightning-fast, cross-border money transfers with the best rates in the market

    Zolve is expanding its horizons, and we’re excited to open our doors to everyone expanding theirs. We believe: that if space tourism is real, so is reaching for the stars.

Although every effort is made to ensure our job offers and external links are accurate, up to date and relevant, IndiaStartupJobs.ml cannot take responsibility for the accuracy of published job offers, or pages maintained by external providers.
